column5: The Airstream is fully renovated with a comfy queen size bed, cold AC, Smart TV, coffee station, small kitchen, work space, and outdoor picnic area. You'll have access to the house with your own private bathroom and shower. We're right next to a bunch of local bars, coffee shops and restaurants. Also close to downtown or east 6th St. Private gated parking. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.
column8: Hip Remodeled Airstream Trailer - close to DT
